edit.title: Edit Profile
edit.avatarHelp: Click to upload a new profile picture

empty.message: Start your reflection journey by creating a new reflection

learningJourney.title: Learning Journey
learningJourney.activePaths: {count, plural, =1 {# active path} other {# active paths}}

groupActivities.title: Group Activities
groupActivities.activeGroups: {count, plural, =1 {# active group} other {# active groups}}
groupActivities.nextMeeting: Next meeting in {days, plural, =1 {# day} other {# days}}

mentorConnection.title: Mentor Connection
mentorConnection.unreadMessages: {count, plural, =1 {# unread message} other {# unread messages}}

initial.title: Initial Thoughts
initial.description: Begin by exploring your first thoughts about this question.
initial.prompt: What comes to mind when you first consider this question?
initial.guidance: Don't worry about finding the 'right' answer - focus on your authentic response.

explore.title: Deeper Exploration
explore.description: Let's examine your initial thoughts more carefully.
explore.prompt: What assumptions underlie your initial response? What might you be taking for granted?
explore.guidance: Consider different perspectives and possible counterarguments.

insight.title: Personal Insight
insight.description: Reflect on what you've discovered through this exploration.
insight.prompt: How has your understanding evolved? What new questions have emerged?
insight.guidance: Connect these insights to your own experience and understanding.

personal.name: Personal Experience
personal.description: Begin with your own experiences and observations
examples: When I look at the stars, I wonder...
This reminds me of a time when...
supporting: What experiences in your life relate to this question?
How does this make you feel?
What stories or memories come to mind?

analytical.name: Analytical Thinking
analytical.description: Examine the question through logical analysis
supporting: What are the key concepts involved?
How might we break this down?

contemplative.name: Deep Contemplation
contemplative.description: Explore the deeper implications and meanings
examples: At the heart of this question lies...
This connects to fundamental questions about...
supporting: How does this relate to existence itself?
What deeper truths might this point to?

metaphysical.name: Metaphysical Inquiry
metaphysical.description: Explore fundamental questions about existence, reality, and being

existence.title: Why does anything exist at all?
existence.description: An exploration of the most fundamental question of existence

epistemological.name: Knowledge & Understanding
epistemological.description: Investigate how we know what we know

certainty.title: Can we be certain of anything?
certainty.description: Examining the foundations of knowledge and certainty

descriptions.prompt: Engage in guided philosophical reflection with adaptive support for your journey of inquiry.
descriptions.paths: Explore interconnected philosophical questions through structured learning paths or free exploration.

learning.title: Learning Paths
learning.subtitle: Explore different approaches to learning and personal development

philosophical.title: Philosophical Inquiry
philosophical.description: Explore fundamental questions and develop critical thinking through structured philosophical investigation

collaborative.title: Collaborative Learning
collaborative.description: Learn together with others through group discussions, shared projects, and peer feedback

personal.title: Personal Development
personal.description: Focus on your individual growth through self-reflection, goal-setting, and structured development plans

groups.title: Groups
groups.subtitle: Join learning groups and participate in collaborative discussions

philosophyCircle.name: Philosophy Circle
philosophyCircle.description: Weekly discussions about fundamental philosophical questions and their practical implications
philosophyCircle.nextTopic: The nature of consciousness and free will

studyGroup.name: Contemplative Practice Group
studyGroup.description: Regular meetings for shared meditation and mindfulness practices

mentorship.title: Mentorship
mentorship.subtitle: Connect with experienced mentors and get guidance on your learning journey

philosopher.title: Philosophical Guide
philosopher.bio: Experienced in guiding philosophical inquiries and fostering critical thinking

practitioner.title: Meditation & Mindfulness Guide
practitioner.bio: Specializes in contemplative practices and personal development
